response.final_text:
I don’t have a tool named "nonexistent_tool" available. Available tools I can run are:

- functions.get_current_time — returns the current date/time
- functions.calculator — evaluates a math expression (e.g., "2+2")
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run any of the above tools in parallel

Tell me which of those you want me to use and what input (e.g., a math expression for calculator), or describe the task you wanted "nonexistent_tool" to do and I’ll pick or combine the appropriate available tools.
